message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $15,000. I believe it holds significant value and this offer reflects that.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is significantly below its value. Could you consider $13,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit steep. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
